name: Affiliates Manager S2Member Integration
author: wp.insider, affmngr

sections.description:
This addon allows you to integrate S2Member plugin with the Affiliates Manager plugin.

When members pay for membership on your site, this addon will check to see if the member was referred to your site by an affiliate. It will then give commission to the affiliate who referred the user.

This addon requires the Affiliates Manager Plugin.

Read the usage documentation here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload affiliates-manager-s2member-integration folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Added commission tracking option for Stripe payment gateway.

1.0.3

  • Made some improvements to the commission tracking option.

1.0.2

  • Fixed a minor bug where the addon was not being to able to award commissions for S2Member signups.

1.0

  • First commit to wordpress.org

short_description: Process an affiliate commission via Affiliates Manager after a S2Member payment
description:
This addon allows you to integrate S2Member plugin with the Affiliates Manager plugin.

When members pay for membership on your site, this addon will check to see if the member was referred to your site by an affiliate. It will then give commission to the affiliate who referred the user.

This addon requires the Affiliates Manager Plugin.

Read the usage documentation here.
